column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Visited Chicago for a few days Lou's was recommended by others and the reviews were good however I think it is highly over rated. We waited 30 for a seat on a Thursday night which wasn't bad at all for 2 people however the wait for the small pizza to arrive took over an hour. The crust is like pie crust
column4: the cheese was the best part
column5: we ordered pepperoni also but there was none on there. I would try another place before coming here again.
